title: 00165 boots then shuts
message:
I have a 820-00165 that had liquid damage, after ultrasonic it boots then after a minute or so shuts down. c5001 and c5020 were messed up replaced no change.
when it shuts i can short r5115 to turn it back on, tested without keyboard.

title: 00165 boots then shuts
message:
Try first starting in SMC bypass.
As you had corrosion near SMC, I recommend you to reball it.

title: 00165 boots then shuts
message: Reballed smc and tried smc bypass same thing sometimes just gets past the login screen sometimes it dosent completley load in after password

title: 00165 boots then shuts
message:
Did the board start with max fan speed in SMC bypass?

Test (in normal mode) booting Windows, or Linux Live USB.

title: 00165 boots then shuts
message: Yes max fan speed in smc bypass i tried ubuntu normally and it hasnt shut down

title: 00165 boots then shuts
message:
Then try to clean ME region.
If not good, try full known good BIOS, with clean ME.

title: 00165 boots then shuts
message: Wrote a clean ME bios file on this one and no change. Where can i learn about what would be an issue with the bios? And im using a file i believe i found on the forum that had a clean ME, are you saying that i need to clean the ME myself from a good bios because im not sure how to do that

title: 00165 boots then shuts
message: Remove R1921 and try to boot macOS again.

title: 00165 boots then shuts
message: Now it shuts down as its loading os (apple logo with loading bar)

title: 00165 boots then shuts
message: Did you try to boot in safe mode?

title: 00165 boots then shuts
message: Safe mode worked. On login screen the screen flickered and made weird lines going up and down the screen it hasnt shut down so far

title: 00165 boots then shuts
message:
So the problem appears when macOS try to load a driver.
For this reason Windows/Linux Live work, as do not load all drivers when booting.
Do fresh install of Windows and check which driver cannot be installed; maybe Intel graphics fails.
You can also run memory test from Windows Live.

title: 00165 boots then shuts
message: Booted off of windows and worked installed the graphics driver *intel hd 6000* and it shut down and shuts down when using the same os with that driver installed

title: 00165 boots then shuts
message: So the cpu is bad? Would reballing be worth a shot

title: 00165 boots then shuts
message:
You can try a reflow, just for test.
I recommend to run a RAM test first, from Windows.
